info.name: Radio
info.summary: Listen to your favorite radio stations
info.description:
Listening to your favorite radio stations in Nextcloud! This app uses radio-browser.info database as a backend.
- 🔊 Listen to radio stations directly in Nextcloud - 🔍 Browse thousands of stations worldwide - ⭐ Create your own list of favorite stations - ⭕ Dashboard widget support - ⚡ Keep track of recent played stations - 📁 Browse stations by language, country, etc. - 👂 Smoth audio playback and transitions
info.author: Jonas Heinrich
